name: AFGBuildableGenerator
comment: Base for all generators, i.e. coal, fuel, nuclear etc.

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Decide on what properties to replicate

methods.name: GetLoadPercentage
methods.comment: Get the current load of this generator in the range [0,1].

methods.name: IsFuseTriggered
methods.comment: @return true if the fuse is triggered.

methods.name: GetPowerProductionCapacity
methods.comment: The power this generator can produce.

methods.name: GetDefaultPowerProductionCapacity
methods.comment: The default amount power this generator can produce.

methods.name: CalcPowerProductionCapacityForPotential
methods.comment: Calculate the power this generator can produce with a given potential.

methods.name: CanStartPowerProduction
methods.comment: Called to check if power production can be started.

methods.name: Factory_StartPowerProduction
methods.comment: Called when we start producing fuel.

methods.name: Factory_StopPowerProduction
methods.comment: Called when we stop producing fuel.

methods.name: Factory_TickPowerProduction
methods.comment:
Tick the power production, consume any fuel, update base and dynamic production.
@param dt - Time since last tick.

properties.name: mPowerProduction
properties.comment: Amount of power this generator produces in MW.

properties.name: mPowerProductionExponent
properties.comment:
Example: 2.5 ^ ( 1 / 1.6 ) = 1.77      An exponent of 1.6 gives a maximum production of 177% at 2.5x overclock.
If exponent is 1.0 the function becomes linear.

properties.name: mLoadPercentage
properties.comment: Current load of this generator in the range [0,1].
